item.title: Black Friday shoppers hit stores across U.S
item.description: The holiday shopping season has begun with stores offering deals and discounts for Black Friday.

item.title: "Mornings Memory": Watching TV on your phone
item.description: Watching videos on your phone is second nature now but it wasn't always like that. Back on this day in 2005, Anthony Mason reported on this new trend.

item.title: Can countries agree to "end the world's plastic pollution crisis"?
